attributes.action: Everyone in Britain should get a vote in the Scotish indipendence referendum, but the Scotish vote should count double
attributes.additional_details: If Scotland becomes an indipendent nation, thus breaking up the United Kingdom, everyone in Britian will be effected and therefore everyone of voting age in Britain should get a vote in the idipendence referendum. However the decision will effect Scotland more than the rest of Britain and therefore the votes of Scotish people should count double those of the rest of the UK.
